name: Super Coin Pusher
description:
Very addictive coin push game, help to relax your pressure, easy to play, you just need to click the screen, drop the coins to receive different rewards. Very easy to control but brings you infinite delight and surprise!

◈ To tap the screen, then the gold coins will drop down，push the coins off the board and enjoy the fun of getting rewards. When the coins fall into the slots, you will have a jackpots chance.

◈ Please tap the screen constantly to push more coins off the board, you can choose to shake the board to make more coins fall into the boxes below. The more you play, the more rewards and cash you will win!

◈ Coins are available for free, use props to get rewards easily.

Do you want to know if you are lucky enough? Download this lucky coin pusher game and play it now! All big prizes are waiting for you!
